member.name: T:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Site.DependencyInitializationModule
member.summary: The DependencyInitializationModule class prepares the dependencies for the services and components supporting the 'Moderation' feature set of the Social platform.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.ConfigureContainer(EPiServer.ServiceLocation.ServiceConfigurationContext)
member.summary: Prepares dependencies for moderation services and components, and registers them with the site's IoC system.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.CreateWorkflowService
member.summary: Factory method supporting the instantiation of the IWorkflowService implementation intended to support the site.
member.returns: Workflow service intended to support the site

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.CreateWorkflowItemService
member.summary: Factory method supporting the instantiation of the IWorkflowItemService implementation intended to support the site.
member.returns: Workflow item service intended to support the site

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.Initialize(EPiServer.Framework.Initialization.InitializationEngine)
member.summary: Executes the initialization procedure for this module.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.Moderation.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.Uninitialize(EPiServer.Framework.Initialization.InitializationEngine)
member.summary: Executes the teardown procedure for this module.
